creator: rkrishna@cisco.com
text:
If it's not already in the pipeline, can we:

. setup a protocol for acquiring jars from a network server
  (potentially, a number of people will set up their own jar servers)
. setup Apache ANT configuration to point to one or more jar servers.
. enhance the build process to acquire/update a jar file from one of the servers
   specified.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
We have a protocol for acquiring jars from a network server, we call it HTTP. 

And we have a task to download stuff using this protocol, we call it <get>. To
deploy to these servers we have many, many tasks, depending on whether servers
are local or remote.

What more do you need?

creator: nick@chalko.com
